My Cursor - select your mouse cursor from a large collection.

My Cursor Extension
Choose funny and nice mouse cursor from our collection.
Disable and return to default cursor with one click of a button.
Instant update.
Save your favorite collections and filter easily :-)

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing My Cursor extension.
